The following external libraries may be required to build some Glympse Client API samples:

* Facebook (FacebookSDK.framework) in ./Facebook
* Google+ (GooglePlus.framework & GoogleOpenSource.framework) in ./GooglePlus

Options include:

* Link to the project folder of an existing copy of the required library.
* Copy or clone the required project here.
* Update the Xcode project of the sample to point to the required library.
